meanings.definition: A person or animal with a passionate or fiery temperament.
meanings.sent1: The hotbloods in the story always acted with intense emotions.
meanings.sent2: The horse, known for its hotbloods, galloped fiercely across the field.
meanings.sent3: The hotbloods at the party made the atmosphere lively and exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her hotbloods were like a raging fire, impossible to contain.
meanings.sent5: The hotbloods of the character made the audience feel their passion.

meanings.definition: A group of people or animals characterized by their high energy or intensity.
meanings.sent1: The hotbloods of the team motivated everyone to give their best.
meanings.sent2: The hotbloods of the pack led them to victory in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The hotbloods in the office always brought a burst of energy to meetings.
meanings.sent4: The hotbloods of the crowd surged forward with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The hotbloods of the group made them stand out from the rest.
